text: Tommi Hakala (born 9 August 1970) is a Finnish operatic baritone and winner of the 2003 BBC Singer of the World Competition in Cardiff. He was born in Riihimäki, Finland. ==Sources== *BBC News, "Finnish flourish for song contest", 30 June 2003 *BBC Singer of the World Competition, Biography: Tommi Hakala Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish opera singers Category:People from Riihimäki Category:21st-century Finnish singers
title: Tommi Hakala
